text.removes: the time windows will delete the following reservations:

repeatingDeletionPopup.title: Delete recurring time window
repeatingDeletionPopup.text: You are deleting a recurring time window. Do you want to delete all following time windows in the same group?

repeatingPopup.text: You modified a recurring time window. Do you want to modify all following time windows in the same group?

calendar.notPast: Time window cannot be added in the past
calendar.notConsecutive: Time windows must not be consecutive
calendar.cantModifyPast: Ongoing or past time windows cannot be modified
calendar.cantMovePast: Ongoing or past time windows cannot be moved
calendar.cantMoveToPast: Time window cannot be moved to the past
calendar.modificationError: An error occurred while modifying the reservation

notTooSoon.begin: Reservation must be made at least
